AccountId.description: The ID of the Bing Ads account.

AgeGroup.description: The age group of the audience targeted by the ad campaign.

Gender.description: The gender of the audience targeted by the ad campaign.

TimePeriod.description: The time period for which the data is reported.

AccountName.description: The name of the Bing Ads account.

AccountNumber.description: The account number associated with the Bing Ads account.

AdGroupName.description: The name of the ad group.

AdGroupId.description: The ID of the ad group.

AdDistribution.description: The type of ad distribution, such as search or content network.

Impressions.description: The number of times the ad was displayed.

Clicks.description: The number of clicks on the ad.

Spend.description: The total amount spent on the ad campaign.

Revenue.description: The total revenue generated from conversions.

ExtendedCost.description: The total cost extended due to possible monthly budget overspend.

Assists.description: The number of assists that contributed to conversions.

Language.description: The language used in targeting the audience.

AccountStatus.description: The status of the Bing Ads account.

AdGroupStatus.description: The status of the ad group.

BaseCampaignId.description: The ID of the base campaign.

AllRevenue.description: The total revenue generated from all conversions.

Goal.description: The goal set for the ad campaign.

GoalType.description: The type of goal set for the ad campaign.

AbsoluteTopImpressionRatePercent.description: The percentage of times your ad was shown at the absolute top of the search results page.

TopImpressionRatePercent.description: The percentage of times your ad was shown above organic search results.

AllConversionsQualified.description: The total number of qualified conversions.

ViewThroughConversionsQualified.description: The number of qualified view-through conversions.

ViewThroughRevenue.description: The total revenue generated from view-through conversions.
